Thanx for the compliment, KSL.

::Zardus::

Zardus raises an eyebrow, looking from Nemesis Enforcer to the scanners. He 
chuckles.

"Excellent," he says, walking over to a console and pushing a few buttons, 
opening a link to Dark One and co. (the ones that had attacked the Ark). He 
raises an eyebrow, noting a few new bots amongst them. He looks back at 
Nemesis Enforcer.

"Can you tell them not to damage the Ark extensively? Our survival may depend 
on it being intact. The can kill the Maximals there if they want, though. 
I'll be in the lab, a new femm has decided to join us."

With that, Zardus walks out, heading back for the lab.
